title: Morning Routine
english: I wake up at seven o'clock and make a cup of coffee before starting my day.
chinese: 我在七點起床，在開始一天前先泡一杯咖啡。

title: Study Time
english: Every evening, I spend at least thirty minutes reading an English article.
chinese: 每個晚上，我至少花三十分鐘閱讀一篇英文文章。

title: Weekend Walk
english: On weekends, I like to take a walk in the park and listen to podcasts.
chinese: 週末時，我喜歡在公園散步並聽播客。
